result.name: england-occupancy-survey--uk-occupancy-survey
result.notes:
Official statistic measuring monthly bedspace and bedroom occupancy of serviced accommodation businesses. England results are combined with those of the other UK tourist boards to calculate UK results. Publication schedule for monthly results is at http://www.visitengland.org/Images/Continuous%20surveys_2013_v7_tcm30-32182.pdf

All current survey deliverables are online at http://www.visitengland.org/insight-statistics/major-tourism-surveys/accommodations/Occupancy_Survey/index.aspx (in collaboration with Visit Wales, VisitScotland and NI Tourist Board)
result.title: England Occupancy Survey / UK Occupancy Survey

extras.value:
Data is analysed via the online input system (ReZolve) which was developed specifically for this survey, and as well as sensitive performance data for individual businesses, incorporates confidential data from consultants STR Global which may not be published. For this reason, there are no plans to make the database available. VE will review scope of deliverables currently in pdf to explore options for publishing in other formats.

The UK report is compiled from aggregated data delivered by the four national tourist boards, so at present there is no scope to produce a UK level microdata set
